name: Heroku Log S3
description: log drain from heroku to s3

DURATION.description: Seconds to buffer until we write to S3

STRFTIME.description: Format of your s3 `object_id` (file path); `:thread_id` will be replaced by a unique number to prevent overwriting of the same file between reboots, in case the timestamp overlaps

HTTP_PASSWORD.description: Password to prevent public from using your log drain

FILTER_PREFIX.description: Lines with this prefix will be saved to S3; non-matching lines are ignored
